title: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR ASSISTING IN THE VERIFICATION AND VALIDATION OF AN ALGORITHM CHAIN
abstract: Method and system for assisting in the verification and validation of an algorithm chain. The system (1) comprises an instrumentation module (2) of an algorithm chain, providing automatic data capture including at least some of the following data: interface data and internal algorithm data of the algorithm chain, a module (3) for automatic verification of functional rules, a learning module (5) for the modelling by learning of the constraints and algorithm criteria of the algorithm chain, and taking account of the validations performed by a human operator, and a module (7) for automatic detection of bugs and functional problems in of the algorithm chain using statistical learning means.
